justification: Slight nod to B’s possible QB stability need, but it ignores B’s stated preferences (possession WRs, buying injured, OL/SOS) and gives up B’s lone workhorse. Claims A has QB surplus when A would be left without a healthy QB, conflicting with A’s stability ethos. Values and roster impacts are underdeveloped; rationale is generic and A-centric. Coherence is shaky but not impossible.
